properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, READ_COUNT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24/60 -- 1분 미만인 경우 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24 -- 1시간 미만인 경우 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 -- 하루 미만인 경우 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" WHERE "COMMENT".BOARD_NO = BOARD.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_DT FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE "BOARD" SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
